archiefmat.titel: Klad-notulen van vergaderingen van Mahamad (kerkbestuur) en Junta (kerkenraad); met bijlagen (ingekomen stukken en minuten van uitgegane stukken)
archiefmat.titel_eng: Draft minutes of the meetings of Mahamad (church government) and Junta (Church Council); with appendices (incoming documents and final drafts of outgoing documents)
archiefmat.scope: This series contains also the first draft of the minutes of the combined meetings of the church councils of the Portuguese-Israelite and Dutch-Israelite communities between 1852 and 1857.
archiefmat.notes: Documents from the period 1834-1861 are in poor physical condition.
